author: mmusich
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## RunII simulation
- **RunII Ideal scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_design_v13](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v13) as [80X_mcRun2_design_v12](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v12) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_design_v13/80X_mcRun2_design_v12): 
  - update uGT L1 menu to `L1Menu_Collisions2016_v1_xml`
- **RunII CRAFT scenario** : [80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v12](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v12) as [80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v11](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v11) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v12/80X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v11): 
  - update uGT L1 menu to `L1Menu_Collisions2016_v1_xml`
- **RunII Asymptotic scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v13](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v13) as [80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v12](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v12) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v13/80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v12): 
  - update uGT L1 menu to `L1Menu_Collisions2016_v1_xml`
- **RunII Startup scenario** : [80X_mcRun2_startup_v13](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v13) as [80X_mcRun2_startup_v12](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v12) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_mcRun2_startup_v13/80X_mcRun2_startup_v12): 
  - update uGT L1 menu to `L1Menu_Collisions2016_v1_xml`
## RunII data
- **RunII HLTHI processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v9](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v9) as [80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v7) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v9/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v7): 
  - new tag for DT and CSC Alignment errors (allow updates via append IOV with hlt synchronization)
  - updated AK4CaloHLT JEC with L2L3 residuals for [CMSHLT-518](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-518)
- **RunII HLT processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v12](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v12) as [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v11](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v11) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v12/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v11): 
  -  new tag for DT and CSC Alignment errors (allow updates via append IOV with hlt synchronization)
- **RunII HLT relval processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v10](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v10) as [80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v8](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v8) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v9/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v8): 
  - new tag for DT and CSC Alignment errors (allow updates via append IOV with hlt synchronization)
  - update uGT L1 menu to `L1Menu_Collisions2016_v1_xml`
- **RunII Offline processing** : [80X_dataRun2_v14](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v14) as [80X_dataRun2_v13](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v13) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_v14/80X_dataRun2_v13): 
  - split Ecal pedestal tags as agreed in [AlCa meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/523683/contributions/2145029/attachments/1263035/1868225/AlCaDB-v12.pdf) to ease validation procedure
- **RunII Offline relval processing** : [80X_dataRun2_relval_v11](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_relval_v11) as [80X_dataRun2_relval_v9](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_relval_v9) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_relval_v11/80X_dataRun2_relval_v9): 
  - update uGT L1 menu to `L1Menu_Collisions2016_v1_xml`
  - split Ecal pedestal tags as agreed in [AlCa meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/523683/contributions/2145029/attachments/1263035/1868225/AlCaDB-v12.pdf) to ease validation procedure
title: Update Global Tag for Collisions2016_v1 L1T menu and splitting Ecal Pedestal tags
